transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Good morning sir, Kusum baat kar rahe hain IndiaMART ke quarter se.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir aapne wo issue resolve karaya wire supply concept wala buyer se baat kari aapne?
Customer: Mam ye buyer se hamari baat na hone ki hai.
Executive: Bandhi kara raha hai fir company ko band kara denge.
Customer: Kaun?
Executive: To company walon ne keh diya band ho gaya.
Executive: Abhi band nahi hua hai.
Customer: [inaudible] consume kar pa rahe kuch nahi kar pa rahe to kya kare.
Executive: Sir services deactivate kari gayi hai, deboost ki gayi hai is wajah se nahi kar pa rahe ho. Ab aap bhi to ready nahi ho rahe ho na usko close karane ke liye aapke liye bhi koi badi cheez to lag nahi rahi jiske liye kuch zaruri hota hai company bhai to wo to wo cheeze karta hai na. Aap kyun nahi kar pa rahe ho client ke sath issue resolve?
Customer: Client karna hi nahi chah raha tum baat kar lo agar wo kar le.
Executive: Kya keh raha hai client aapko?
Customer: Sir hamara koi role nahi hai isme.
Executive: Client kya bol raha hai aapke ki main nahi karunga complaint close?
Customer: Aapko last bar aise talking hui thi.
Customer: Ab mujhe call karna main to samajhta hu ke mera chahe barbad ho jau aabad ho jau lekin main call nahi karunga. 2000.
Executive: Sir wo client paisa nahi le raha kya bol raha hai sir 2000 ki baat hai aap usse itna to bol sakte ho sir do ki jagah teen le le lekin complaint close karaye customer bol kya raha hai ki main complaint nahi close karaunga aapko jo karna hai kar lo mujhe na paisa chahiye na product chahiye wo ye bol raha hai.
Customer: Yahi bol raha hu.
Executive: Yahi bol raha hai?
Customer: Haan yahi to bol raha hai na.
Executive: Sir aap client ko thoda sa convince karne ka koshish karo aap usko kyunki.
Customer: Mam ek bar hath jode pair pakdu ye wale kam to main itna bada business bana raha hu main ab 2000 ke liye sare kam karunga.
Executive: Baat 2000 ki nahi hai sir ji baat hai kyunki aapki company IndiaMART pe jo chal rahi hai itne saal se aap IndiaMART pe kam kar rahe ho wo band ho jayega na. Baat 2000 ki nahi hai baat ye hai 2022 se jo aap global handicraft company IndiaMART pe leke chal rahe ho itne salon ki jo ispe promotion listing visibility hai ye ab aapka renewal bhi hai tab tak aap issue bhi nahi resolve karwa paoge theek hai to company fir proper block hogi aapki ye same company same GST ko kabhi chalu nahi kara paoge aap to.
Executive: Baat ye hai ki teen char saal purani company close ho jayegi aapki baat 2000 ki nahi hai seller ke sath aapki.
Executive: Aap usse wo cheez baat karo bhai zyada level pe baat karo ki bhai dekh tere ko theek hai maine meri side se galti rahi bhai main nahi provide kar paya tujhe mal ya jo bhi hai abhi isko close karwa kyunki meri char saal ki purani company hai agar ye complaint close nahi hoga meri online company band ho jayegi aap usko samne original cheez bolo na. To client bhi samjhega ki bhai 2000 ke chakkar mein us company ko kyun close karwa raha ho ab uske upar koi ego pe baat hogi to kuch nahi ho sakta lekin sabse bada loss to aapka hai na. Char saal panch saal purani company aap close ho jayegi ek chhoti si complaint ki wajah se.
Customer: Ye ho gaya jo IndiaMART ki end se kuch ho nahi sakta isme.
Executive: Sir isme kuch nahi hota wo karega buyer bolega tabhi ho sakta hai.
Customer: Wahi to keh raha hu main wo karega nahi mam IndiaMART ki taraf se kuch hoga nahi. To bataiye kaise hoga.
Executive: Wo aap easily chhod de rahe ho na sir aap khud hi apni side se bol rahe ho ke main to.
Customer: Main to ye man ye man le raha hu main to main usi aapko ek second.
Executive: Kya bol raha hai?
Customer: Us din aapse baat hui thi. Us din aapse baat hui thi to main to man le raha ke ab khatam kuch ho nahi raha.
Executive: Offline mein agar aisa complaint ho jaye wo chala jaye legal to aap offline bhi business aaram se band kar doge fir to kisi din. Aapke liye itna kuch khas zaruri hai hi nahi sir.
Customer: Nahi agar ek baat suniye agar offline mein 2000 ki baat hogi to isko kya karega aadmi kya kar payega usi din bhi.
Executive: Lekin sir aap to dekho aap se baat karke mujhe khud ye samajh aa raha hai ki aapke liye kuch bahut badi baat nahi hai ye ke company band ho jaye meri baat 2000 ki aapko 2000 dikh rahe hain sir aapko ye nahi dikh raha ki char saal se jo aapki company chal rahi hai ye close ho jayegi to kya hoga abhi aapke paas aap buyleads nahi consume kar pa rahe ho lekin jo customer aapke paas inquiry ya call kar raha hai usko to abhi aap nahi rok pa rahe na usko IndiaMART ne bhi roka hai lekin abhi aapko is mahine ki 20 tarikh ko wo sab kuch band ho jayega account bhi freeze ho jayega aapka. Kyunki services ka renewal hai wo ho nahi payega hum renewal utha hi nahi sakte jab tak issue nahi resolve ho jaye to company fir puri block hogi sir char saal panch saal jo aapne company ko diya hai is domain pe jo diya hai www.indiamart.com global handicraft ye pura band ho jayega. Aapke 2000 3000 ki baat hai agar aap customer chalo man lo gusse mein bhi hai ya customer customer hai sir theek hai aap usko 2000 ki jagah shayad 5000 ka amount bol sakte ho main just suggest nahi kar rahi main kuch bhi nahi bol rahi main bas itna keh rahi hu aap.
Customer: Mam aapke aapke side se call ja ke usko nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Mam aapki taraf se call ja ke usko nahi.
Executive: Nahi sir hamari side se buyer ko call kyun jayega deal aapka hai aapko dekh lo sir isliye ab main aapko bata du abhi aapke services sirf itni freeze hai deboost ki gayi hai service aap buyleads consumption nahi kar pa rahe ho services aapki live hai abhi bas aap buyleads consume nahi kar pa rahe ho.
Customer: Nahi product consume nahi ho rahe.
Executive: Haan matlab ho sakta hai deboost mein wo bhi unhone kar diya ho lekin abhi company active hai aapki company deactivate nahi ki gayi hai agar aapka issue resolve ho jayega ye dono cheeze live ho jayengi wo to ho jayega lekin issue to resolve karo services mein time services to aapki hum company band nahi kar sakte jab tak aapka renewal due date na nikal jaye aapka renewal due date jo hai sir 20 November ka hai 20 November tak agar aapne renewal nahi karaya 20 November tak aapne issue resolve nahi karaya sab band ho jayega abhi sirf.
Customer: January tak ha january tak service lagbhag February tak.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai main bata de rahi hu main aapko sab pakka.
Executive: Confirm date to hai aapka renewal aapki sir company kab tak hamare paas active rahegi buyleads consume kar pao na kar pao wo baat ki baat hai lekin aapki jo hamare paas company hai wo kab tak rahegi main bata de rahi hu.
Customer: Abhi teen mahine honge mam.
Executive: Nahi nahi main bata rahi hu wo to aap aage peeche karte rehte ho na wo to services hosting date hoti hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: December 4 last.
Customer: 4 December?
Executive: Haan 4 December ko band ho jayega 20 January jo aapke account bhi pura close ho jayega wo to hosting date hota hai na sir. Aapne jaise man lo aapne koi nayi service li aaj aapne paisa de diya service kab se chalu ho gayi 15 din baad se 15 din baad se hi shuru hongi na cheeze.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Wahi cheez hai is wajah se aisa hai. Aap dekh lo sir isko sahi karwa lo customer se dekh lo kis tarike se baat ho sakti hai agar zyada door ka customer na ho to paas ja ke baat kar loge matlab 2000 ki jagah panch le lo lekin complaint close karwa do meri char saal panch saal purani company band ho jayegi aapki garaj honi chahiye na waha pe ki bhai aapko karana hai aap to bahut free hand chal rahe ho ye band ho jayega tab aapko isko realize hoga ke yaar main jaise taise karke shayad mana leta but maine nahi kara wo galti ho gayi meri. Aur dobara se ab jab aap nayi company nayi GST leke aaoge na IndiaMART pe kisi bhi platform pe bhi jaoge man lo pura aapko sirf wahi time aapko lagega jaate hi waha pe koi upgrade plan to lene loge char panch lakh ka theek nahi nahi sakta aadmi IndiaMART se bhi nahi le paoge ki aap direct ja ke char panch lakh ka plan le lo fir aap basic se shuru karoge ek saal do saal lagega usko pura promote hone usme business aane mein tab tak aapko lagega ye business hi nahi de pa rahe mujhe tab tak competition acche khase jagah pe pahunch chuka hoga aur aap zero se shuru kar rahe hoge.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir bahut bar na aisa hota hai ki insan samne wala business kar raha hota hai lekin usko itni knowledge nahi hoti.
Customer: Mam aap aap ek bar baat nahi kar sakte?
Executive: Sir hum nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Mam aap ek bar mere liye baat kar lijiye.
Executive: Sir nahi kar sakte sir aapko karni padegi hum nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Nahi apne mam ho sakta hai to do minute ki baat personal number se kar lijiye 2000 humse le lijiye.
Executive: Are sir baat uski nahi hai hamare hath mein nahi hota sir aur hamare numbers wagera sab kuch track hota hai hamare hath mein nahi hota hamare to field department hamare to jo complaint department hai usme bhi aapka number aapka usme bol customer unse bhi nahi man raha wo bhi illegal team hai meri jagah IndiaMART ke legal team ne approach kiya baat cheet kari wo nahi man rahe unse mere baat karne se thodi na man jayenge sir wo customer se hi man payenge na meri jagah IndiaMART ke legal team ne baat kar li hai customer unse bhi nahi mang rahe unhone bola ki bhaiya buyer hi kara sakta hai isko.
Customer: Ab uska number bhi pata nahi kahan hoga.
Executive: Detail main de deti hu agar number number chahiye main de deti hu ruko ek second.
Executive: Aapka naam kya hai?
Customer: Mera naam Nasir hai.
Executive: Nasir us client ka naam shayad Satish hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukna ha.
Executive: Arjita Chauhan koi ladki hai kya ye?
Customer: Ji isi liye to main baat nahi kar raha.
Customer: Yahi to dikkat hai.
Executive: Number lo unka 95601.
Customer: 95601.
Executive: 44113.
Customer: 4411.
Executive: Haan three.
Executive: Arjita Chauhan baat kar lo.
Customer: Main unse baat karta hu fir ye hoga na.
Executive: Theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to resolve complaint with buyer.

- Fears company closure due to unresolved complaint.

- Believes IndiaMART is not helping enough.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the consequences of unresolved issue.

- Executive provided the buyer's contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try to contact the buyer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, closure, buyleads, renewal, company
